get.description: Lists the dimensions by the defined scope.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: May be used to filter dimensions by properties/category, properties/usageStart, properties/usageEnd. Supported operators are 'eq','lt', 'gt', 'le', 'ge'.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: May be used to expand the properties/data within a dimension category. By default, data is not included when listing dimensions.

parameters.name: $skiptoken
parameters.description: Skiptoken is only used if a previous operation returned a partial result. If a previous response contains a nextLink element, the value of the nextLink element will include a skiptoken parameter that specifies a starting point to use for subsequent calls.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: May be used to limit the number of results to the most recent N dimension data.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Query the usage data for scope defined.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the CreateOrUpdate Query Config operation.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: The operation to list all exports at the given scope.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: The operation to get the export for the defined scope by export name.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: The operation to create or update a export. Update operation requires latest eTag to be set in the request. You may obtain the latest eTag by performing a get operation. Create operation does not require eTag.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the CreateOrUpdate Export operation.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: The operation to delete a export.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: The operation to execute a export.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: The operation to get the execution history of an export for the defined scope by export name.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all of the available cost management REST API operations.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

message.description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.

ErrorResponse.description: Error response indicates that the service is not able to process the incoming request. The reason is provided in the error message.

DimensionsListResult.description: Result of listing dimensions. It contains a list of available dimensions.

total.description: Total number of data for the dimension.

nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

QueryResult.description: Result of query. It contains all columns listed under groupings and aggregation.

nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

OperationListResult.description: Result of listing cost management operations. It contains a list of operations and a URL link to get the next set of results.

value.description: List of cost management operations supported by the Microsoft.CostManagement resource provider.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results if there are any.

Operation.description: A Cost management REST API operation.

display.description: The object that represents the operation.

resource.description: Resource on which the operation is performed: Dimensions, Query.

operation.description: Operation type: Read, write, delete, etc.

timeframe.description: The time frame for pulling data for the query. If custom, then a specific time period must be provided.

timePeriod.description: Has time period for pulling data for the query.

dataset.description: Has definition for data in this query.

QueryTimePeriod.description: The start and end date for pulling data for the query.

from.description: The start date to pull data from.

to.description: The end date to pull data to.

QueryDataset.description: The definition of data present in the query.

granularity.description: The granularity of rows in the query.

configuration.description: Has configuration information for the data in the export. The configuration will be ignored if aggregation and grouping are provided.

aggregation.description: Dictionary of aggregation expression to use in the query. The key of each item in the dictionary is the alias for the aggregated column. Query can have up to 2 aggregation clauses.

grouping.description: Array of group by expression to use in the query. Query can have up to 2 group by clauses.

sorting.description: Array of sorting by columns in query.

filter.description: Has filter expression to use in the query.

QuerySortingConfiguration.description: The configuration for sorting in the query.

name.description: The name of the column to use in sorting.

QueryDatasetConfiguration.description: The configuration of dataset in the query.

columns.description: Array of column names to be included in the query. Any valid query column name is allowed. If not provided, then query includes all columns.

QueryAggregation.description: The aggregation expression to be used in the query.

name.description: The name of the column to aggregate.

function.description: The name of the aggregation function to use.

QueryGrouping.description: The group by expression to be used in the query.

type.description: Has type of the column to group.

name.description: The name of the column to group.

QueryFilter.description: The filter expression to be used in the export.

and.description: The logical "AND" expression. Must have at least 2 items.

or.description: The logical "OR" expression. Must have at least 2 items.

dimension.description: Has comparison expression for a dimension

tag.description: Has comparison expression for a tag

QueryColumnType.description: The type of the column in the export.

QueryComparisonExpression.description: The comparison expression to be used in the query.

name.description: The name of the column to use in comparison.

operator.description: The operator to use for comparison.

values.description: Array of values to use for comparison

ExportListResult.description: Result of listing exports. It contains a list of available exports in the scope provided.

schedule.description: Has schedule information for the export.

CommonExportProperties.description: The common properties of the export.

format.description: The format of the export being delivered.

deliveryInfo.description: Has delivery information for the export.

ExportSchedule.description: The schedule associated with a export.

status.description: The status of the schedule. Whether active or not. If inactive, the export's scheduled execution is paused.

recurrencePeriod.description: Has start and end date of the recurrence. The start date must be in future. If present, the end date must be greater than start date.

ExportDeliveryInfo.description: The delivery information associated with a export.

destination.description: Has destination for the export being delivered.

ExportRecurrencePeriod.description: The start and end date for recurrence schedule.

ExportDeliveryDestination.description: The destination information for the delivery of the export.

resourceId.description: The resource id of the storage account where exports will be delivered.

container.description: The name of the container where exports will be uploaded.

rootFolderPath.description: The name of the directory where exports will be uploaded.

ExportExecutionListResult.description: Result of listing exports execution history of a export by name

ExportExecutionProperties.description: The properties of the export execution.

executionType.description: The type of the export execution.

status.description: The status of the export execution.

submittedBy.description: The identifier for the entity that executed the export. For OnDemand executions, it is the email id. For Scheduled executions, it is the constant value - System.

submittedTime.description: The time when export was queued to be executed.

processingStartTime.description: The time when export was picked up to be executed.

processingEndTime.description: The time when export execution finished.

fileName.description: The name of the file export got written to.

scopeDimensionParameter.name: scope
scopeDimensionParameter.description: The scope associated with dimension operations. This includes '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/' for subscription scope, '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}' for resourceGroup scope, '/providers/Microsoft.Billing/billingAccounts/{billingAccountId}' for Billing Account scope, '/providers/Microsoft.Billing/billingAccounts/{billingAccountId}/departments/{departmentId}' for Department scope, '/providers/Microsoft.Billing/billingAccounts/{billingAccountId}/enrollmentAccounts/{enrollmentAccountId}' for EnrollmentAccount scope, '/providers/Microsoft.Management/managementGroups/{managementGroupId}' for Management Group scope, '/providers/Microsoft.Billing/billingAccounts/{billingAccountId}/billingProfiles/{billingProfileId}' for billingProfile scope, 'providers/Microsoft.Billing/billingAccounts/{billingAccountId}/billingProfiles/{billingProfileId}/invoiceSections/{invoiceSectionId}' for invoiceSection scope, 'providers/Microsoft.Billing/billingAccounts/{billingAccountId}/customers/{customerId}' specific for partners, 'providers/Microsoft.CostManagement/ExternalSubscriptions/{externalSubscriptionId}' for linked account and 'providers/Microsoft.CostManagement/externalBillingAccounts/{externalBillingAccountId}' for consolidated account

scopeQueryParameter.name: scope
scopeQueryParameter.description: The scope associated with query and export operations. This includes '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/' for subscription scope, '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}' for resourceGroup scope, '/providers/Microsoft.Billing/billingAccounts/{billingAccountId}' for Billing Account scope and '/providers/Microsoft.Billing/billingAccounts/{billingAccountId}/departments/{departmentId}' for Department scope, '/providers/Microsoft.Billing/billingAccounts/{billingAccountId}/enrollmentAccounts/{enrollmentAccountId}' for EnrollmentAccount scope, '/providers/Microsoft.Management/managementGroups/{managementGroupId} for Management Group scope, '/providers/Microsoft.Billing/billingAccounts/{billingAccountId}/billingProfiles/{billingProfileId}' for billingProfile scope, 'providers/Microsoft.Billing/billingAccounts/{billingAccountId}/billingProfiles/{billingProfileId}/invoiceSections/{invoiceSectionId}' for invoiceSection scope, 'providers/Microsoft.Billing/billingAccounts/{billingAccountId}/customers/{customerId}' specific for partners, 'providers/Microsoft.CostManagement/ExternalSubscriptions/{externalSubscriptionId}' for linked account and 'providers/Microsoft.CostManagement/externalBillingAccounts/{externalBillingAccountId}' for consolidated account

apiVersionParameter.name: api-version
apiVersionParameter.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request. The current version is 2019-10-01.
